alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Harrison; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:13PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN HARRISON...CARROLL AND EASTERN TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 413 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Navarre to 8 miles northeast of Freeport. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Philadelphia, Dover, Uhrichsville, Carrollton, Dennison, Augusta, Malvern, Tuscarawas, Bolivar, Scio, Midvale, and Mineral City. This includes Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 90 and 94. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
